page.title: 11MY DAY BY AN ADULT
page.content: At 6.30 {the baby is fed}My husband and two older children get up and dress by 7.a.m.have breakfast and I { {make sandwiches}for lunch.I feed the ponies,milk the goats and let out the poultry.The toddler has his breakfast and the{baby is fed again}.We go to the{play group}from 9-11a.m.The toddler has lunch and an afternoon sleep.I do the washing,ironing, cleaning and sewing.Sometimes we meet the children at school.After a cooked meal for the family and the washing up the children wash and go to bed.{The {poultry and goats are locked up} and the evening is spent sewing,letter writing or watching T.V.The {baby is {bathed}and put to bed and I follow at 12.30 a.m..
